face detector and alignment.from sentence: Then we compare our face detector and alignment against the state - of - the - art methods in Face Detection Data Set and Benchmark ( FDDB ) , WIDER FACE , and Annotated Facial Landmarks in the Wild ( AFLW ) benchmark .
